paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, Maschil, A Psalm of David, when the Ziphims came and said to Saul, Doth not David hide himself with us?
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, Maschil, A Psalm of David, when the Ziphims came and said to Saul, Doth not David hide himself with us?

paragraphs.content: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.

paragraphs.content: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.

paragraphs.content: For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Behold, God is mine helper: the Lord is with them that uphold my soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, God is mine helper: the Lord is with them that uphold my soul.

paragraphs.content: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.

paragraphs.content: I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O LORD; for it is good.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O Lord; for it is good.

paragraphs.content: For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen his desire upon mine enemies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen his desire upon mine enemies.
